node.html:
I am a technology enthusiast, hacker, scientist, AI and Quantum thought leader, startup advisor, panelist, consultant.

My goal is to augment and propel the European technology ecosystem forwards and establish a self-reliant and capable tech sector made in Europe. My expertise lies in designing, architecting and implementing technological AI- and Quantum-based solutions to business problems, advising for compliance engineering challenges and reviewing of technologial solutions and teams for risk assessments.
